user.description: The Hilo integration interacts with the Hilo application. Hilo is a smart home product made by a subsidary of Hydro Quebec.

abort.already_configured: This Hilo account is already in use.

data.untarificated_devices: Generate only total meters for each devices
data.hq_plan_name: Hydro Quebec rate plan name ('rate d' or 'flex d')
data.log_traces: Also log request data and websocket messages (requires debug log level on both the integration and pyhilo)
data.challenge_lock: Lock climate entities during Hilo challenges, preventing any changes when a challenge is in progress.
data.track_unknown_sources: Track unknown power sources in a separate energy sensor. This is a round approximation calculated when we get a reading from the Smart Energy Meter.
data.appreciation_phase: Add an appreciation phase of X hours before the preheat phase.
data.pre_cold_phase: Add a cooldown phase of X hours to reduce temperatures before the appreciation phase.
